subject: MOZA CR2
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

With the pro x linear pedal haptics work with Moza CR2 pedals and do I have to connect the pedals to the control box?

Thanks,

Andrew 


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrew Weil,    Simply connect the haptics to our control box. Pedals from other brands are not compatible with our control box.
